objects.specification: A large flat floor for the trade show booth featuring a neutral grey #CCCCCC smooth non-slip vinyl texture with subtle matte finish, providing a sturdy foundation across a 20 by 20 meter area.
An upright wall panel with a stylish automotive-themed texture, featuring a subtle metallic sheen and modern graphic accents to enclose the booth perimeter.

A low-profile display platform constructed from metallic silver material with a polished finish, sturdy rectangular shape to elevate the demo car for better visibility.
A full-scale demonstration car model painted in vibrant red with a high-gloss finish, aerodynamic contours, realistic headlights, detailed wheels, and premium trim details.
A freestanding informational display panel featuring high-resolution car specifications and promotional graphics, framed in a sleek matte-finished border with a thin low-profile structure.

A modern reception desk with a complementary dark-toned finish, smooth surfaces, integrated signage area, and modest storage compartments to welcome visitors.
A round visitor table with a glossy white surface, slim central pedestal base, designed for casual seating and small discussions.
